subject: Conditional TestSuite !!!
msgSnippet: Hi All, I have a question on TestSuite. Can we decide at run time, which test cases we want to include in the TestSuite. Something like this public class
messageBody:
Hi All,

I have a question on TestSuite.
Can we decide at run time, which test cases we want to include in the
TestSuite.
Something like this

public class MyTestSuite extends Test
{
public MyTestSuite()
{
}

private static boolean required = false ;

public void isRequired()
{
// check for existing of some thing, and set "required".
}

public static Test suite()
{
if( required )
{
suite.addTest(new TestSuite(TestCase1.class));
}
suite.addTest(new TestSuite(TestCase2.class));
suite.addTest(new TestSuite(TestCase3.class));
}
}

Thank you for your consideration in this matter.

With Regards,
Rakesh.
